title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is being marked as dirty even though no changes are made to it.
OB: When using code assist and there is nothing to suggest, the file becomes dirty even though no changes have been made to it.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1. Open the file.
2. Invoke code assist when there is no suggestion available.
3. Check if the file is marked as dirty.
